data.name: Brave Eduardo
data.detailed_description:
Living World


Our approach to Brave Eduardo’s world is character focused. While the environment is important, this Victorian Era inspired world is heavily driven by ambitious businessman, dutiful Knights, contentious monarchy system, and beings beyond people’s (Bear’s) comprehension. There is an anxious class struggle between Spidz and Bears, manipulated by well-connected individuals from both sides.

For Fans of Hollow Knight and Breath of the Wild


During the very beginning phases of Brave Eduardo, we were absolutely entranced by the flawless combat system of Hollow Knight. We also loved the freedom that we felt while playing Breath of the Wild. As a result, we spent a lot of time in making the combat feel good, while trying to make the game feel as open and free as possible. We put in mechanics like cooking, weather, and dungeon crawling inspired heavily by Legend of Zelda, Breath of the Wild.

Brave Eduardo Was Originally Designed As A Horror Game


There is something that people like about seeing an adorable and cute thing sitting next to a body horror-inspired monster. While we scaled back tried to scale back the horror as much as possible during, the audience of many conventions URGED us to return the horror aspect to the game. We’ve decided to keep the scary part in the game but doing so subtly.

A Card Game within the RPG


We think what makes a good RPG (i.e. Knights of the Old Republic, Witcher, Skyrim…etc) is always the world. What the citizens do for entertainment is a big part of it. With this excuse in mind, John embarked on a journey to draw 100 cards and he completed his trek on the very last day of 2019. (P.S. there is a physical version of this game as well!)

An Amazing Composer


As you can probably tell from the music in the trailer, our composer is amazing. He is working hard on making a great theme and sound effects for the game. We even hired an orchestra to play his music live! One thing we can always be sure of is an amazing OST (just look at our other games)! It is all cause of our amazing composer.

data.short_description: Play as a teddy bear trying to find his place in a vast 2D Open World set in the Victorian era. Explore bustling towns and magical biomes while befriending a diverse cast of bears on your journey. Just BEAR in mind: everyone isn't as they seem.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 5 years or younger. Integrated graphics and very low budget cards may not work. Shader Model 3.0 required
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.13 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 470
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS, Ubuntu 12.04 or later, or otherwise compatible Linux distribution
  • Processor: 2GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card with 256 MB shared or dedicated RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
